statements: UPDATE customer_segmentation SET age = 35, income = 75000 WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE customer_segmentation SET gender = 'Female', purchase_history = '{"total_purchases": 10, "last_purchase_date": "2022-03-15"}' WHERE customer_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE customer_segmentation SET age = 35, income = 75000.50 WHERE customer_id = '3e5baee0-8c8f-4556-aa72-bb5582d1e427';
UPDATE customer_segmentation SET purchase_history = '{"purchases": ["product1", "product2", "product3"]}' WHERE customer_id = 'c5e8f75b-0fcc-48ac-bb63-b07bf39a6978';
UPDATE customer_demographics SET age = 25, gender = 'Male' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE purchase_history SET purchase_amount = 50.75, purchase_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE purchase_id = 3;
UPDATE customer_demographics SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE purchase_history SET purchase_amount = 50.25, purchase_date = '2022-02-18' WHERE customer_id = 54321 AND product_name = 'Smartphone';
UPDATE customers SET age = 30, first_name = 'John' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE purchase_history SET purchase_amount = 150.50, product_name = 'New Product' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE behavior SET login_date = '2022-01-15', page_views = 20, time_spent_on_site = '1 hour' WHERE behavior_id = 2;
UPDATE CustomerDemographics SET age = 40, income = 75000 WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE CustomerBehavior SET online_activity = TRUE, purchase_preferences = 'Electronics' WHERE customer_id = 201;
UPDATE CustomerDemographics SET age = 30, gender = 'Female' WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE CustomerBehavior SET online_activity = true, purchase_preferences = 'Electronics, Fashion' WHERE customer_id = 54321;
UPDATE CustomerDemographics SET age = 35, gender = 'Male' WHERE customer_id = 101
UPDATE CampaignResults SET conversion_rate = 0.25 WHERE campaign_id = 201 AND customer_id = 301
UPDATE CustomerDemographics SET age = 35, gender = 'Female', location = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE MarketingCampaigns SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31', campaign_name = 'Holiday Sale' WHERE campaign_id = 1001;
